Fair Board & Committees
Fair Board & Committees
The Pasco County Fair Association is indeed a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization
. This designation means it's a tax-exempt, non-profit organization recognized by the Internal Revenue Service. Donations to the Pasco County Fair Association are tax-deductible. The association operates the Pasco County Fair in
Dade City, Florida
.
The Pasco County Fair Association board of directors holds its monthly meetings on the
second Thursday of each month at 6:00 PM
. The meetings take place at the fairgrounds.  The board is elected at the annual membership meeting in April.
OFFICERS

Kevin Corrigan
